mapper.insert: insert into schedule ( PARTY_ID, SCH_TITLE, SCH_WRITER, SCH_CONTENT, SCH_LOCATION, SCH_NOTE, SCH_MEMBER_COUNT, SCH_DATE) values (#{party_id}, #{sch_title},#{sch_writer},#{sch_content},#{sch_location}, #{sch_note},#{sch_member_count},#{sch_date})
mapper.select: select u.name from user u join schedule_member s on u.user_id = s.user_id where s.party_id =${party_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE_MEMBER(USER_ID, SCH_ID, PARTY_ID, RATE1, RATE2, RATE3) VALUES (#{user_id}, ${sch_id}, ${party_id}, ${rate1}, ${rate2}, ${rate3})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCHEDULE WHERE SCH_DATE LIKE ('${year}-${month}%') AND SCH_AVAILABLE=TRUE AND PARTY_ID=#{party_id} ORDER BY SCH_DATE ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SCHEDULE_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id} AND SCH_ID=#{sch_id}
UPDATE SCHEDULE SET SCH_AVAILABLE=FALSE WHERE SCH_ID = ${sch_id}
